title: ZenPkgs Browser v1.1.0 Release
content:
## better search performance

 since ZenPkgs will soon include all legacy options and packages, making search more performant was necessary.

 so, what did i do? i made it use the virtual scroller class used in the unfiltered tree.

 what this does is make it so that only the elements that are visible are rendered.

 before, with a 10mb test file (around 7k entries!), just typing anything into the search bar would make my browser freeze.

 now, it's buttery smooth as god intended.

 enjoy
